cbccore.low
Class Simulator

java.lang.Object
  cbccore.low.Simulator

public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object

A parent class for any simulator. The goal is to provide an easy way to write or link a simulator with CBCJVM.

Author:
Benjamin Woodruff
